query: SELECT f.code, f.name, COUNT(r.id) as requirement_count FROM frameworks f LEFT JOIN requirements r ON f.id = r.frameworkId GROUP BY f.id, f.code, f.name;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3VC7xi4RHX81jG7.65112bc774d1 --database K34VNBtbDJyjtW8qhrCBdB --execute SELECT f.code, f.name, COUNT(r.id) as requirement_count FROM frameworks f LEFT JOIN requirements r ON f.id = r.frameworkId GROUP BY f.id, f.code, f.name;
